original_text:
With hooks they pulled him into a cage
    and brought him to the king of Babylon.
They put him in prison,
    so his roar was heard no longer
    on the mountains of Israel.
korean_text: 우리에 넣고 갈고리를 꿰어 끌고 바벨론 왕에게 이르렀나니 그를 옥에 가두어 그 소리가 다시 이스라엘 산에 들리지 아니하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: With hooks they pulled him into a cage
and brought him to the king of Babylon
so his roar was heard no longer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그의 포효소리는 더 이상 들리지 않았다
